price: Shpallja e këtij Libri është prej Allahut, të Plotfuqishmit dhe të Gjithëdijshmit,
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
